name: Security Mania
tag_list: home-security-products, security-alarms, video-surveillance, cctv-cameras, dvr-systems, ge-security, honeywell-power-products, toshiba-security
overview:
The low price leader for all your security needs.

Here in Security Mania, one can select a wide array of security products ranging from Access Control, Intrusion Deterrence, Perimeter Protection, Video Surveillance System, down to Network Video Recorders, DVRs, Professional Audio/Video, Camera Accessories and many more. We provide high quality equipments from leading manufacturers such as Sony, ACTi, Pelco, GE Security, Honeywell and over 300 brands in the security industry that can fulfill customer satisfaction and needs. Customer service is our Highest Priority. Security Mania boasts our customer friendly atmosphere for we have trained customer and technical support staffs waiting to guide and answer all questions. Let this be your one stop shopping convenience store for all your security needs.
